params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the Document to get. In the format: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}/documents/{document_path}.

params.name: data.mask
params.description: The fields to return. If not set, returns all fields. If the document has a field that is not present in this mask, that field will not be returned in the response.

params.name: data.read_time
params.description: Reads the version of the document at the given time. This may not be older than 60 seconds.
